name: D&D&D (NellyFlo)
description:
!Attention! The Game need quite long to load. Don't close it even if it seems to long. And the game might have a few bugs, sorry. Its our first game ;)

You have 5 dice with number 3 effect-dice that determine what numbers you need. Reroll the best combinations to try to make as much damage or armor as possible. The effects are inspired by yahtzee so for example calculate the Sum of only even

Ps: Sadly the current version does not contain as many dice as he hoped we could make in the time, so it doesn't allow for very diverse strategies.
